title: Going out
creator_credit: Maija Rove and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Dragon’s tongue”.
Episode three covers simple vocabulary associated with excursions to the cinema, a clothes market and the zoo. Vocabulary for clothes and telling the time are included in the two dramatised situations “Sold out” and “Are there any sharks?” The calligraphy section shows the characters for film, television, eye, mirror, glasses, sun and sunglasses. Introduced by Colin McKerras. In Mandarin and English.
